children._comment: the container that will hold the HeadlineElement. It will show info on whatever item is selected
note the below two fields, the container tells the category controller which container is to be used

open-store-fullxp._comment: In online mode, go to the GOTY bundle.
In offline mode, go to the HITMAN app (which will redirect to the dlc page).
open-store-fullxp._comment2: We can't update this link over our server. So we keep it save and go to the app ID.
